testcase.name: check Incentivized ad- If you tap on close/continue button.
testcase.summary: Incentivized ad- If you tap on close, The Ad should be closed otherwise it should resume
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu tab.

3.Tap on Play button

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button.

4. Incentivized dialog box apper click close / continue button on dialog box.
step.expectedresults:
• If User tap on close button then Ad Experience should close
  • If User tap on continue button then Ad experience should resume
